mapper.insert: insert into others_employment (name, employment, graduating, disciplinaryRate, note, year, classTeacher) values (#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{employment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{graduating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disciplinaryRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update others_employment set name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, employment = #{employment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, graduating = #{graduating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disciplinaryRate = #{disciplinaryRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classTeacher = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, employment, graduating, disciplinaryRate, note, year, classTeacher from others_employment
